mapper.select:
SELECT
,c.nickname,p.product_code,p.product_name, ps.spec_name,ps.spec_price
FROM t_shopping_cart sc INNER JOIN t_customer c ON sc.customer_id=c.customer_id
INNER JOIN t_product p ON sc.product_id=p.product_id and p.status=1
INNER JOIN t_spec ps ON sc.spec_id=ps.spec_id
WHERE sc.customer_id=#{customerId}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(amount),0) FROM t_shopping_cart sc INNER JOIN t_spec s ON sc.product_id = s.product_id AND s.spec_id = sc.spec_id INNER JOIN t_product p ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE customer_id = #{customer_id} AND s.status = 1 AND p.status = 1
